T01n888u_001:3: divodāsādayo bhūpāḥ sa no rakṣatu mārajit || 1 ||
T01n888u_001:5: grahānadamayad yo vai sa no rakṣatu tadbhayāt || 2 ||
T01n888u_001:7: prāvrājayat sumuktyarthaṃ sa no rakṣatu muktidaḥ || 3 ||
T01n888u_001:9: durbhikṣabhayato nityaṃ sa no rakṣatu śākyarāṭ || 4 ||
T01n888u_001:11: cakraṃ dūrīkṛtaṃ yena sa no rakṣatu mātṛvān || 5 ||
T01n888u_001:13: kāśīyān prākarodāḍhyān sa no rakṣatu kāñcanaiḥ || 6 ||
T01n888u_001:14: bhūtvā yaḥ sudhano nāma nidhānaṃ samadarśayat |
T01n888u_001:15: dāridrayaduḥkhato nityaṃ sa no rakṣatu sarvavit || 7 ||
T01n888u_001:19: prakāśayannije dehe sa no rakṣatu dharmavit || 9 ||
T01n888u_001:22: gopān rarakṣa yo devyāḥ prabhāvaṃ saṃprakāśayan |
T01n888u_001:24: yo'ndhībhūtāṃ mātaraṃ svāṃ cūḍāratnaṃ jale vyadhāt |
T01n888u_001:25: divyanetrān janān kṛtvā sa no rakṣatu netradaḥ || 12 ||
T01n888u_001:31: rarakṣa dhāraṇīvijñaḥ sa no rakṣatu nirviṣaḥ || 15 ||
T01n888u_001:33: kapilān prasthito yo'sau sa no rakṣatu santatam || 16 ||
